description: Returns information about reserved Elasticsearch instances for this account.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Provides an identifier to allow retrieval of paginated results.

nested_items.name: ReservationName
nested_items.description: The customer-specified identifier to track this reservation.

nested_items.name: ReservedElasticsearchInstanceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the reservation.

nested_items.name: ElasticsearchInstanceType
nested_items.description: The Elasticsearch instance type offered by the reserved instance offering.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The duration, in seconds, for which the Elasticsearch instance is reserved.

nested_items.name: FixedPrice
nested_items.description: The upfront fixed charge you will paid to purchase the specific reserved Elasticsearch instance offering.

nested_items.name: UsagePrice
nested_items.description: The rate you are charged for each hour for the domain that is using this reserved instance.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code for the reserved Elasticsearch instance offering.

nested_items.name: ElasticsearchInstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of Elasticsearch instances that have been reserved.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the reserved Elasticsearch instance.

nested_items.name: PaymentOption
nested_items.description: The payment option as defined in the reserved Elasticsearch instance offering.

nested_items.name: RecurringCharges
nested_items.description: The charge to your account regardless of whether you are creating any domains using the instance offering.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeAmount
nested_items.description: The monetary amount of the recurring charge.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency of the recurring charge.
